meanings.definition: Developing or moving from the base towards the apex.
meanings.sent1: The acropetal growth of the plant's leaves was evident as they unfurled from the stem.
meanings.sent2: The acropetal arrangement of the flowers made them look like a beautiful cascade.
meanings.sent3: The acropetal progression of the ants climbing the tree trunk was like a tiny parade.
meanings.sent4: Her acropetal journey from beginner to expert gardener was filled with learning and growth.
meanings.sent5: The acropetal pattern of the vines climbing the wall created a stunning visual effect.
